DocLocalization.Name: Weist Steuerung / Regelung / Einschränkung zu - Relation

DocAttribute.Name: RelatingControl
DocAttribute.Documentation: Reference to the _IfcControl_ that applies a control upon objects.

DocWhereRule.Name: NoSelfReference
DocWhereRule.Documentation: The instance to with the relation points shall not be contained in the set of _RelatedObjects_.
